languages.text: "Значит, пришел выпрашивать помощь? Ну давай, постарайся. Может, я сегодня в хорошем настроении".
languages.translation_comment:
Не играли сначала, не видели Соломона на Райкаде
Или видели Соломона на Райкаде, но без купленного ДЛЦ

Не играли сначала, не видели Соломона на Райкаде
Или видели Соломона на Райкаде, но без купленного ДЛЦ

languages.text: "You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."
languages.original_text: "Значит, пришел выпрашивать помощь? Ну давай, постарайся. Может, я сегодня в хорошем настроении".

traits.locale_text: "You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."
"You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."
"You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."
"You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."
"You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."

languages.text: «¿Ha venido a suplicar mi ayuda? De acuerdo, exponga su solicitud. Es posible que despierte mi generosidad».
languages.original_text: "You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha venido a suplicar mi ayuda? De acuerdo, exponga su solicitud. Es posible que despierte mi generosidad».

languages.text: “你是来求我帮忙的吗？很好，继续说吧。说不定我心情好，愿意帮你呢。”
languages.original_text: "You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."

traits.locale_text: “你是来求我帮忙的吗？很好，继续说吧。说不定我心情好，愿意帮你呢。”

languages.text: « Vous êtes là pour quémander mon aide ? Eh bien, allez-y, je vous écoute. Avec un peu de chance, je daignerai peut-être accéder à votre demande. »
languages.original_text: "You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes là pour quémander mon aide ? Eh bien, allez-y, je vous écoute. Avec un peu de chance, je daignerai peut-être accéder à votre demande. »

languages.text: 「君は、{mf|俺|私}の助けを請うために来たのか？では、続けて、君の言い訳を述べなさい。もしかしたら、君を助けてあげようという気になるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."

traits.locale_text: 「君は、{mf|俺|私}の助けを請うために来たのか？では、続けて、君の言い訳を述べなさい。もしかしたら、君を助けてあげようという気になるかもしれない」

languages.text: "Buraya benden yardım dilenmeye mi geldin? Buyur bakalım, de diyeceğini. Belki bugün yardım etmeye meyilli bir ruh hâlindeyimdir."
languages.original_text: "You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."

traits.locale_text: "Buraya benden yardım dilenmeye mi geldin? Buyur bakalım, de diyeceğini. Belki bugün yardım etmeye meyilli bir ruh hâlindeyimdir."

languages.text: "Ihr seid hier, um mich um Hilfe zu bitten? Also schön, tragt Euren Fall vor. Vielleicht bin ich ja gewillt, Euch zu helfen."
languages.original_text: "You are here to beg for my help? Well, go on, then, make your case. Perhaps you have found me in a helpful mood."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid hier, um mich um Hilfe zu bitten? Also schön, tragt Euren Fall vor. Vielleicht bin ich ja gewillt, Euch zu helfen."
